description.text: Critical and intersectional analysis of gender relations, discrimination, and inclusion policies (LGBTQIA+, feminism, minorities). Research tools, project management, advocacy, and social change.

items.title: Bac+2 - Web and Mobile Web Developer - Full-stack JavaScript

description.text:
**Frontend** : Html5 - Css3 - Sass/Scss - JavaScript - Typescript - React 
 **Bactend** : Node.js - Express.js - PostgreSQL - SequeLize 
  **Specialization** : React - Redux
**Principles and skills**: MVC Architecture - Active record - Object Oriented Programming (OOP) - Data Modeling (MCD, MLD) - Agile Project Management - Responsive Web Design - API Rest
**Tools and methodologies**: Git - Insomnia, Postman - Shell - ESlint

items.title: Master II - Public policy - International humanitarian action

description.text: **Option** : Emergency and Rehabilitation Graduation with AB
Project cycle management, quality monitoring, evaluation and capitalisation Country cases, case studies, project design, strengthening and partnerships

**Internship thesis I**: "*ICTs in the international solidarity sector, reflections on a forced integration*" 
 **Internship thesis II**: "*The notion of crisis and its use in migration issues, from a mobilisation tool to the abuse of an object that has become political*"
Simulation of international crisis management, World cultural areas, Religions and globalisation, European political economy, Comparative foreign policies
**Thesis** : "*The externalisation of migration controls in the Sahel. A study of a new tool for an extra-territorial European border management policy*"
Major in administrative law, international law and European law
Diploma awarded by Toulouse I Capitole University : Graduated  mention B
